resources.string: Turn your phone into a tracing lightbox. Point your camera at your drawing surface, pick a reference image, and trace with precision.
Select the option that matches your equipment.
Full DIY — Print your own markers

Print two ArUco markers (ID #0 and #1) at about 2 cm each. Tape them at the top-left and top-right corners of your drawing area, so your hands never cover them. Prop your phone about 25–30 cm above the surface so the camera sees both markers.

Print the ArUco marker sheet from the setup guide. Cut out markers #0 and #1, tape them at the top-left and top-right corners of your drawing area. Position your phone about 25–30 cm above so both markers stay visible while you draw.

Print the ArUco marker sheet. Tape markers #0 and #1 at the top-left and top-right corners. Mount your phone on the stand about 25–30 cm above the surface — high enough to see both markers, low enough to trace comfortably.
